'''Crimsonflank Pigeon''' is a type of pigeon that can be found in the wild.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|1}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Can be found individually on the bridge just outside [[Mondstadt]] where NPC [[Timmie]] is with other pigeon types.
